verses.roman:
sei bhakta dhanya, ye nā chāḍe prabhura caraṇa
sei prabhu dhanya, ye nā chāḍe nija-jana

synonyms: sei bhakta—that devotee; dhanya—glorious; ye—who; nā—not; chāḍe—gives up; prabhura caraṇa—the lotus feet of the Lord; sei prabhu—that Personality of Godhead; dhanya—glorious; ye—who; nā—not; chāḍe—gives up; nija-jana—His servant.
translation: "Glorious is that devotee who does not give up the shelter of his Lord, and glorious is that Lord who does not abandon His servant.
